timeline.bodyText: What is the purpose of pulling this out? Just for logging?
timeline.author: calbach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,10 +3,12 @@ set -e
 
 # This script makes CircleCI exit a non pull-request job.
 
-echo "CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST: ${CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST}"
-regexp="[[:digit:]]\+$"
-PR_NUMBER=`echo $CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST | grep -o $regexp`
-echo "PR_NUMBER: ${PR_NUMBER}"
+if [[ ${CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST} ]]; then
+  echo "CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST: ${CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST}"
+  regexp="[[:digit:]]\+$"
+  PR_NUMBER=`echo $CIRCLE_PULL_REQUEST | grep -o $regexp`
+  echo "PR_NUMBER: ${PR_NUMBER}"

replies.bodyText: correct. just for logging. I will remove this block of code in future after making sure this change is working without a hitch.
replies.author: aweng98
